metadata.title: CVE-2020-10957 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In Dovecot before 2.3.10.1, unauthenticated sending of malformed parametersto a NOOP command causes a NULL Pointer Dereference and crash insubmission-login, submission, or lmtp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-10957` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dovecot-core - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.12
dovecot-gssapi - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.12
dovecot-imapd - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.12
dovecot-ldap - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.12
dovecot-lmtpd - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.12
dovecot-lucene - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.12
dovecot-managesieved - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.12
dovecot-mysql - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.12
dovecot-pgsql - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.12
dovecot-pop3d - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.12
dovecot-sieve - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.12
dovecot-solr - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.12
dovecot-sqlite - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.12
mail-stack-delivery - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.12
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dovecot package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.12').
